Dimple Java API 0.07

Packages 
Package Description
com.analog.lyric.collect
General collection classes not covered by those provided by standard library or Guava.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.environment
Shared environment for Dimple library.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.events
Classes for controlling the generation and handling of events specific to Dimple.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.exceptions
Exceptions classes specific to Dimple.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.factorfunctions
Standard FactorFunction implementations.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.factorfunctions.core
Factor functions and factor tables.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.core
Core factor graph API.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.domains
Variable domain classes and related helpers.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.factors
Model factors.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.repeated
Supports "rolled-up" graphs.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.transform
Code for model transformations, including variable elimination and junction tree.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.values
Value holder classes.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.model.variables
Model variables.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.nestedgraphs
Specializations of FactorGraph intended to be used as nested graphs.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.options
Extended Statically typed hierarchical option support for Dimple.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.schedulers
Core inference scheduling API.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.schedulers.schedule
Inference schedule implementations.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.schedulers.scheduleEntry
Inference schedule entries.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core
Solver implementation base classes.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.parameterizedMessages
Standard parameterized message types.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proposalKernels
Proposal kernel support.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.core.proxy
Base classes for proxy solvers that delegate to another model.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs
Gibbs sampler based solver.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.samplers
Gibbs samplers.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.samplers.block
Block samplers for Gibbs solver.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.samplers.conjugate
Conjugate samplers for Gibbs solver.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.gibbs.samplers.generic
Non-conjugate single-variable samplers for Gibbs solver.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.interfaces
Core interfaces for Dimple solvers.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.junctiontree
Junction-tree solver for inferring marginals (uses sum-product).
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.junctiontreemap
Junction-tree solver for MAP problems (uses min-sum).
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp
Linear-programming based solver (requires external solver).
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.minsum
Min-sum belief-propagation solver for discrete MAP inference.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.optimizedupdate
Optimized message update support for Sum-Product and Min-Sum solvers.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.particleBP
Particle belief-propagation solver.
com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.sumproduct
Sum-product belief propagation for inferring marginals on discrete and real graphs.
com.analog.lyric.options
Statically typed hierarchical option support.
